logistic.R: Outstanding system automation + governance hooks required for the Metaquest launch lattice.

logistic.zeta: Damped when BreakPoint rituals precede automation pushes and sigillin_sync telemetry is logged.

meta.resonance: Captures the core Metaquest system meaning so agents can orient automation, indices, and UTAC observatories without rereading every compass entry. Acts as the semantic lantern that keeps σ(β(R-Θ)) visible for infrastructure stewards.

activation_hooks.trigger: Codex entry for Metaquest system work created
activation_hooks.response: Update sigil timestamps, confirm anchors still reference same codex ID, notify shadow pair.
Mirror fields in sigil + compass, append new backlog vector if guard missing.
Consult shadow sigil, perform BreakPoint ritual, document remediation before resuming.

null_model.description: Metaquest automation progresses without codex/UTAC parity; telemetry + indices drift quietly.
fallout: Launch readiness cannot be certified because Θ is undocumented.
Shadow alerts fire late, forcing manual reconstruction of automation history.
σ(β(R-Θ)) saturates unpredictably, risking premature launch commitments.
